showcase.title: Works Showcase Reel
showcase.description: A showcase of works by TTO.

images.alt: A graphic embossed on metal. It reads 'Brother & Stone'.
A 100ml perfume bottle with a chartreuse-green label. The brand name is 'Millie and Frank'.
A label of a muted-brown paper-like material. The brand name is 'Brother & Stone'.
A 10ml perfume bottle with an amber liquid inside. The label reads '88 Keys'.
A poster with a strong grid layout of stones overlaid by large sans-serif text. It is for University of North Dakota's Minerology collection.
An dual toned poster of earth-green both saturated and desaturated. It is for a photography work/s by Lloyd Godman.
An in-situ photo of a label and clip attached to a coat. The blue label read 'Maier Haus' and 'South Wing'.
A two-page spread of a book showcasing an installation within a gallery space. The installation is made of draped and colourful fabrics.
A two-page spread of a book that details artists and their respective works. A caption, description and the material information of the art are included.
The front cover of a printed publication with a yellow sleeve, banded across the lower third of the front cover. It is for RMIT's 'Drawn In First Editio' 2023.
A collage of labels/fliers in a myriad of affable colours. They simply read 'RMIT Drawing Studio 2023 Graduates'.
A close-up photo of interior furniture overlaid by a poster for an impressionist painting. It reads 'Advent, Gabriele Münter (1948)'.
A single-page spread of a document with a black & white colour scheme and refined grid layout. The title– 'PARCEL GUIDELINES & MANIFESTO'.
A black paper-based clothing label with an embossing on it's bottom-edge: PARCEL.
A cropped frame of a single-page editorial spread. There are meandering dots gently placed over text and imagery.
A scan of a business card for 'CORUS'. A multi-colour grid is blurred and overlaid by contact information.
A control knob with raised ribbing along it's circumference. It is of a light-grey colour and reflects a nostalgic aesthetic.
A photo of an apparatus from a machine that could be the Mars Rover or retro cinema film camera. There is a CYMK colour separation of this image spread above the photo.
A brooding and luxurious interior photo of a curved wall and lighting fixture. The text 'MÜNCHEN' & '1948' with a logo of a lion splitting them in the middle is overlaid the photo.

An in-situ photo of a rotating bus shelter ad enclsoure. The poster within it contains graphics for a radio station. The type is sans-serif and appears to be a friendly grotesque. A woman's blonde hair is overlaid by this text including a red cirle that house 'MIX 100"9'.
An in-situ photo of a person walking and carrying a tote bag. The tote bag is clay-brown and sports a light blue circle with the text 'TRANCE' overlaying it.
